1.1.name: wordpress/dbd-footprints
1.1.description: There are quite a few free, or near free tracking solutions out there, but many of them require a JavaScript snippet to be placed on your page. This is where DBD Footprints steps in. A new menu item will be added to the Options menu of WP. On this page you will be able to edit the code/text needed for tracking or anything else you can dream up.
